You have entered the secret tunnel under this arena, where the Moon Treasure is hidden. Use your golden keys to open those mysterious chests. Choose wisely, you can stop anytime. Remember that each gold key worths $250

You must outsmart your opponents by answering questions correctly. Each round, $1000 (1000 pts) is distributed equally for each regular opponents; as they are removed from the game, you get their portions
If you surpass 90 regular opponents, you are prompted to a special level where you can use gold keys to open mysterious chests. Within the time limit, if you
When you end your game with less than 90 rivals eliminated, you lose the battle and half of your pts (money) is taken away by rivals
Each question has 4 choices and falls under 1 of 8 topics. You have 20 seconds to answer; when time reaches 0, the moon explodes and your game ends
You have 3 helps: eliminating 2 wrong choices, changing question and polling the remaining opponents (you cannot poll the guests). Each can only be used once
Question is more difficult in later stages. After round 12, questions become extremely hard

There are 100 opponents and 4 special guests chosen randomly from a set of 10. There are three levels of opponents, first-time, experience and smart; which influence how they play and gain intelligence through out the game.
Guests are more intelligent than regular opponents and they each have 2 specialties. They rarely answer wrong on questions under their specialties
Each guests carries a unique ability. Upon defeating a guest, you acquire that ability, money and one gold key, which can be used for bonus round
